Products.Title: Blazor Reports
Products.Description: A feature-complete reporting suite for Blazor-powered web applications. DevExpress Reports for Blazor ships with an intuitive Visual Studio Report Designer and a comprehensive suite of report elements such as tables, labels, objects, charts, pivot tables, etc.

Products.Title: Blazor Upload
Products.Description: An easy-to-use Blazor UI component designed to monitor and manage the file upload process at runtime.

DemoPages.Title: Document Viewer
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Document Viewer allows end users to preview, print, and export documents.

DemoPages.Title: Report Designer
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report designer, reportdesigner, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Designer allows end users to create and edit reports.
